price: 86. En Wij hebben hen Onze genade gegeven. Waarlijk, zij behoorden tot de rechtgeleiden.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā innahum mina al-ṣāliḥīna
